Name: WF - XII “Ragnarok”
Description:
War machine born from Gestalt Project. Heavy Assault Mech that can equip 4 different weapons with corresponding abilities.

Can attack the ground and air.
Detection unit

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Ragnarok can change its abilities based on the current weapon equipped. These include Covering Fire that can deal aoe dmg, Asgard Fall that is good at crowd control, Thermal Lance that can deal continuous dmg, and Doom Lockdown that can target single unit.
Root.Name: Loki System

Root.Tooltip: Launch a beam of thermal laser to target area. It will explode and deal 175 dmg to enemy ground units. Target hit by Thermal Lance will be ignited and this effect can be stacked, losing health according to the stack of ignited.
Root.Name: Thermal Lance

Root.Tooltip: Lock on a target and annihilate it. During the process, Ragnarok's weapon range and atk speed will increase by 150%. Doom Lockdown will last for 16 sec or until target is dead.
Root.Name: Doom Lockdown

Root.Tooltip: Rake front area for 25 times using machine gun, deal 25 dmg to all enemies within each time, and last for 6 sec
Root.Name: Covering Fire

Root.Tooltip: Leap to target location. Deal 100 dmg to all nearby ground units and stun them for 1.5 sec. Meanwhile, Ragnarok will be granted with "Asgard Fall!" effect, increasing its movement speed and ignore collision size. It next attack will aso drag all nearby units and deal dmg twice to nearby ground units. Last for 5 sec.
Root.Name: Asgard Fall

Root.Tooltip: Ragnarok charges to target location, knocks off all enemy units in the path, stuns them for 2 sec, and deals 50 dmg to them.
Root.Name: Fearless Charge

Root.Tooltip: Switch the weapon of this unit.
Root.Name: Switch Armory

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Ragnarok scans surronding area and locks onto at most 5 enemies. Launch a polariton missile to target and deal 150 aoe dmg.
Root.Name: Wide Area Bombardment

Root.Tooltip: Specialized coating. It is said to preach the existence of a creature on a distant planet. Ragnarok gain 1000 health, 6 armor, and can heal itself continuous at rate of 25 health per sec.
Root.Name: Nyan Nyan Mecha!

Root.Tooltip: This unit can detect cloaked, burrowed, and hallucinated units.
Root.Name: Detector

0002.Tooltip:
Switch to TI - Terminator. Destructive rotary machine gun that can use Covering Fire to deal large amount of aoe dmg.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Equip TI - Terminator

0002.Tooltip:
Switch to TII - Laevateinn. Heavy blades that can use Asgard Fall to jump to target area and enhance its attack.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Equip TII - Laevateinn

0002.Tooltip:
Switch to TIII - Hellfire Flamethrower. Specialized flamethrowers that can use thermal lance to rapidly deal continuous damage.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Equip TIII - Hellfire Flamethrower

0002.Tooltip:
Switch to TIV - Gungnir. Laser cannon that can use Doom Lockdown to lock on a target and annihilate it.

Can attack the ground and air.
0002.Name: Equip TIV - Gungnir

Behaviors.Tooltip: This unit can detect cloaked or burrowed units within its sight range.
Behaviors.Name: Detector
